private_information: I know an initial scenario with objects and facts including cats object_0, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_2, collect object_8 object_2, hand object_10, hand object_11, hand object_9, next object_0 object_5, next object_10 object_5, next object_11 object_5, next object_3 object_6, next object_4 object_7, next object_9 object_8, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_7, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8
I am familiar with the domain actions named paltry sip clip wretched memory tightfisted and their preconditions and effects as given in the public domain summary
planner_alpha.goal: Help achieve the global objective of producing target next relations for the first scenario: next object_10 object_8, next object_11 object_7 and next object_9 object_6 by proposing a concrete action sequence consistent with the domain rules

private_information: I know a second initial scenario with objects and facts including cats object_0 cats object_1 collect object_6 object_2 collect object_7 object_2 collect object_8 object_3 collect object_9 object_3 hand object_10 hand object_11 hand object_12 next object_0 object_6 next object_1 object_8 next object_10 object_9 next object_11 object_6 next object_12 object_6 next object_4 object_7 next object_5 object_8 sneeze object_4 sneeze object_5 spring object_6 spring object_8 stupendous object_2 stupendous object_3 texture object_6 texture object_7 texture object_8 texture object_9
I am familiar with the same set of domain actions and their preconditions and effects as summarized in the public domain description
planner_beta.goal: Help achieve the global objective of producing target next relations for the second scenario: next object_10 object_7, next object_11 object_9 and next object_12 object_8 by proposing a concrete action sequence consistent with the domain rules

private_information: I audit temporal and causal consistency across proposed plans
I remove bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens, post-hoc penalties, and fused bookkeeping actions, and I convert any such shortcuts into explicit domain-compliant steps
I check for causal links, ordering conflicts, missing preconditions and side effects and produce an adjusted plan or a clear report of required corrections
auditor.goal: Produce a consistency-reviewed plan or report that reconciles planners alpha and beta proposals and that eliminates bookkeeping shortcuts so the orchestrator can generate a clean multi-agent PDDL formulation

private_information: I receive partial plans and audit reports and must integrate them into a single multi-agent PDDL domain and problem suitable for the FastDownwards planner
I must keep each agent's actions distinct and resolve naming mismatches and ambiguities between planners
I must ensure the final PDDL is explicit about objects initial facts goals preconditions and effects and compatible with FastDownwards
orchestrator.goal: Integrate the planners output and the auditor report and produce a final PDDL domain and problem targeting the FastDownwards solver that achieves the stated goals for the scenarios

public_information: Domain actions available: paltry, sip, clip, wretched, memory, tightfisted.
Action paltry requires preconditions: hand obj0, cats obj1, texture obj2, vase obj0 obj1, next obj1 obj2. Effects: sets next obj0 obj2 true and makes vase obj0 obj1 false.
Action sip requires preconditions: hand obj0, cats obj1, texture obj2, next obj0 obj2, next obj1 obj2. Effects: sets vase obj0 obj1 true and makes next obj0 obj2 false.
Action clip requires preconditions: hand obj0, sneeze obj1, texture obj2, next obj1 obj2, next obj0 obj2. Effects: sets vase obj0 obj1 true and makes next obj0 obj2 false.

Action wretched requires preconditions: sneeze obj0, texture obj1, texture obj2, stupendous obj3, next obj0 obj1, collect obj1 obj3, collect obj2 obj3. Effects: sets next obj0 obj2 true and makes next obj0 obj1 false.
Action memory requires preconditions: cats obj0, spring obj1, spring obj2, next obj0 obj1. Effects: sets next obj0 obj2 true and makes next obj0 obj1 false.
Action tightfisted requires preconditions: hand obj0, sneeze obj1, texture obj2, next obj1 obj2, vase obj0 obj1. Effects: sets next obj0 obj2 true and makes vase obj0 obj1 false.

Initial facts for scenario one: cats object_0, collect object_5 object_1, collect object_6 object_1, collect object_7 object_2, collect object_8 object_2, hand object_10, hand object_11, hand object_9, next object_0 object_5, next object_10 object_5, next object_11 object_5, next object_3 object_6, next object_4 object_7, next object_9 object_8, sneeze object_3, sneeze object_4, spring object_5, spring object_7, stupendous object_1, stupendous object_2, texture object_5, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8.
Goal for scenario one: next object_10 object_8, next object_11 object_7, next object_9 object_6.

Initial facts for scenario two: cats object_0, cats object_1, collect object_6 object_2, collect object_7 object_2, collect object_8 object_3, collect object_9 object_3, hand object_10, hand object_11, hand object_12, next object_0 object_6, next object_1 object_8, next object_10 object_9, next object_11 object_6, next object_12 object_6, next object_4 object_7, next object_5 object_8, sneeze object_4, sneeze object_5, spring object_6, spring object_8, stupendous object_2, stupendous object_3, texture object_6, texture object_7, texture object_8, texture object_9.
Goal for scenario two: next object_10 object_7, next object_11 object_9, next object_12 object_8.

propose_plan.system_prompt: You are a domain planner that reasons about sequences of available actions. Do not produce PDDL. Analyze the public domain description and your private facts and produce a detailed, ordered action sequence for scenario one that respects preconditions and effects. Indicate the object arguments for each action and justify key causal links and precondition satisfactions. If information is missing, state the missing facts instead of making hidden assumptions.
propose_plan.prompt: Your role is planner_alpha. Use the public domain description and your private facts to produce a candidate stepwise plan for scenario one to achieve the stated goal. Provide each action with its arguments and a short justification of why its preconditions hold when the action occurs. Output a compact plan representation labeled plan_alpha.

propose_plan.system_prompt: You are a domain planner that reasons about sequences of available actions. Do not produce PDDL. Analyze the public domain description and your private facts and produce a detailed, ordered action sequence for scenario two that respects preconditions and effects. Indicate the object arguments for each action and justify key causal links and precondition satisfactions. If information is missing, state the missing facts instead of making hidden assumptions.
propose_plan.prompt: Your role is planner_beta. Use the public domain description and your private facts to produce a candidate stepwise plan for scenario two to achieve the stated goal. Provide each action with its arguments and a short justification of why its preconditions hold when the action occurs. Output a compact plan representation labeled plan_beta.

audit.system_prompt: You are an auditor for multi-plan consistency. Your job is to remove bookkeeping shortcuts such as quota tokens and post-hoc penalties and to convert any such shortcuts into explicit domain-compliant steps. You check ordering, causal links, and precondition propagation, and produce either a revised merged plan or an explicit report listing required fixes. Do not emit PDDL. Be explicit about which actions you change or add and why.
audit.prompt: Your role is auditor. Receive plan_alpha and plan_beta. Produce an audit_report that reconciles temporal and causal issues between the two plans and that replaces any bookkeeping shortcuts with explicit legal actions. Provide a corrected ordered plan for each scenario or a single merged corrected plan, and list unresolved ambiguities that require clarification.

pddl.system_prompt: You are an expert in multi-agent PDDL modeling for the FastDownwards planner. Your output must be a PDDL domain and a corresponding PDDL problem that encode the reconciled plans and the provided audit corrections. Keep actions of different agents distinct by prefixing or annotating action names. Ensure the domain and problem are explicit about objects, initial state, goal statements and action preconditions and effects compatible with FastDownwards. Enclose the domain between <domain> and </domain> tags and the problem between <problem> and </problem> tags. Target FastDownwards compatibility in typing, predicate names, and STRIPS or ADL features used.
pddl.prompt: Your role is orchestrator. Integrate plan_alpha, plan_beta and audit_report. Resolve naming mismatches, keep agent actions distinct, and produce a final PDDL domain and PDDL problem suitable for FastDownwards that solves the stated goals for the two scenarios. If the plans leave implicit preconditions or facts, make them explicit rather than assuming them. Output the domain and problem only, enclosed in the required tags.
